original: Udāna 8.8
analyzed: udāna

original: Visākhāsutta
analyzed: visākhāsutta

original: Evaṁ me sutaṁ—
analyzed: evam me suta

original: ekaṁ samayaṁ bhagavā sāvatthiyaṁ viharati pubbārāme migāramātupāsāde.
analyzed: ekam samayam bhagavā sāvatthiyam viharati pubbārāme migāra mātu pāsāde

original: Tena kho pana samayena visākhāya migāramātuyā nattā kālaṅkatā hoti piyā manāpā.
analyzed: tena kho pana samayena visākhāya migāra mātuyā nattā kālaṅkatā hoti piyā manāpā

original: Atha kho visākhā migāramātā allavatthā allakesā divā divassa yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā bhagavantaṁ abhivādetvā ekamantaṁ nisīdi.
analyzed: atha khalu visākhā migāra mātā allavatthā allakesā divā divassa yena bhagavā tena upasaṅkami upasaṅkamitvā bhagavantam abhivādetvā ekamantam nisīdi

original: Ekamantaṁ nisinnaṁ kho visākhaṁ migāramātaraṁ bhagavā etadavoca:
analyzed: ekamantam nisinnam khalu visākham migāra mātaram bhagavān etat avoca

original: “Handa kuto nu tvaṁ, visākhe, āgacchasi allavatthā allakesā idhūpasaṅkantā divā divassā”ti?
analyzed: handa kutas nu tva visākhe āgacchasi allavatthā allakesā idhu upasaṅkantā divā divassā ati

original: “Nattā me, bhante, piyā manāpā kālaṅkatā.
analyzed: nattā me bhante piyā manāpā kālaṅkatā

original: Tenāhaṁ allavatthā allakesā idhūpasaṅkantā divā divassā”ti.
analyzed: tena aham alla vatthā alla kesā idhu upasaṅkantā divā divassā ati

original: “Iccheyyāsi tvaṁ, visākhe, yāvatikā sāvatthiyā manussā tāvatike putte ca nattāro cā”ti?
analyzed: iccheyyāsi tva visākhe yāvatikā sāvatthiyā manussā tāvatike putte ca nattāro ca ati

original: “Iccheyyāhaṁ, bhagavā, yāvatikā sāvatthiyā manussā tāvatike putte ca nattāro cā”ti.
analyzed: iccheyya āha bhagavā yāvatikā sāvatthiyāḥ manussā tāvatike putte ca nattāro ca ati

original: “Kīvabahukā pana, visākhe, sāvatthiyā manussā devasikaṁ kālaṁ karontī”ti?
analyzed: kīvabahukā pana visākhe sāvatthiyāḥ manussāḥ devasikam kālam karonti iti

original: “Dasapi, bhante, sāvatthiyā manussā devasikaṁ kālaṁ karonti;
analyzed: dasa api bhante sāvatthiyāḥ manussāḥ devasikam kālam karonti

original: navapi, bhante …
analyzed: nava pi bhante

original: aṭṭhapi, bhante …
analyzed: aṭṭhapi bhante

original: sattapi, bhante …
analyzed: bhante

original: chapi, bhante …
analyzed: chapi bhante

original: pañcapi, bhante …
analyzed: pañca api bhante

original: cattāropi, bhante …
analyzed: cattāraḥ api bhante

original: tīṇipi, bhante …
analyzed: tīṇi pi bhante

original: dvepi, bhante, sāvatthiyā manussā devasikaṁ kālaṁ karonti.
analyzed: dve api bhante sāvatthiyāḥ manussāḥ devasikam kālam karonti

original: Ekopi, bhante, sāvatthiyā manusso devasikaṁ kālaṁ karoti.
analyzed: ekaḥ api bhante sāvatthiyā manussaḥ devasikam kālam karoti

original: Avivittā, bhante, sāvatthi manussehi kālaṁ karontehī”ti.
analyzed: a vivittā bhante sāvatthi manussehi kālam karontehi iti

original: “Taṁ kiṁ maññasi, visākhe, api nu tvaṁ kadāci karahaci anallavatthā vā bhaveyyāsi anallakesā vā”ti?
analyzed: tam kim maññasi visākhe api nu tvam kadāci karahaci anallavatthā vā bhaveyyāsi analla kesā vā ati

original: “No hetaṁ, bhante.
analyzed: naḥ heta bhante

original: Alaṁ me, bhante, tāva bahukehi puttehi ca nattārehi cā”ti.
analyzed: alam me bhante tāva bahukehi puttehi ca nattārehi ca ati

original: “Yesaṁ kho, visākhe, sataṁ piyāni, sataṁ tesaṁ dukkhāni;
analyzed: yesam kho visākhe satam piyāni satam tesam dukkhāni

original: yesaṁ navuti piyāni, navuti tesaṁ dukkhāni;
analyzed: yesam navuti piyāni navuti tesam dukkhāni

original: yesaṁ asīti piyāni, asīti tesaṁ dukkhāni;
analyzed: yesam asi iti piyāni asi iti tesam dukkhāni

original: yesaṁ sattati piyāni, sattati tesaṁ dukkhāni;
analyzed: yesam sattati piyāni sattati tesam dukkhāni

original: yesaṁ saṭṭhi piyāni, saṭṭhi tesaṁ dukkhāni;
analyzed: yesam saṭṭhi piyāni saṭṭhi tesam dukkhāni

original: yesaṁ paññāsaṁ piyāni, paññāsaṁ tesaṁ dukkhāni;
analyzed: yesam paññāsam piyāni paññāsam tesam dukkhāni

original: yesaṁ cattārīsaṁ piyāni, cattārīsaṁ tesaṁ dukkhāni,
analyzed: yesam cattārīsam piyāni cattārīsam tesam dukkhāni

original: yesaṁ tiṁsaṁ piyāni, tiṁsaṁ tesaṁ dukkhāni;
analyzed: yesam tisam piyāni tisam tesam dukkhāni

original: yesaṁ vīsati piyāni, vīsati tesaṁ dukkhāni,
analyzed: yesam vīsati piyāni vīsati tesam dukkhāni

original: yesaṁ dasa piyāni, dasa tesaṁ dukkhāni;
analyzed: yesam dasa piyāni dasa tesam dukkhāni

original: yesaṁ nava piyāni, nava tesaṁ dukkhāni;
analyzed: yesam nava piyāni nava tesam dukkhāni

original: yesaṁ aṭṭha piyāni, aṭṭha tesaṁ dukkhāni;
analyzed: yesam aṭṭha piyāni aṭṭha tesam dukkhāni

original: yesaṁ satta piyāni, satta tesaṁ dukkhāni;
analyzed: yesam satta piyāni satta tesam dukkhāni

original: yesaṁ cha piyāni, cha tesaṁ dukkhāni;
analyzed: yesam cha piyāni cha tesam dukkhāni

original: yesaṁ pañca piyāni, pañca tesaṁ dukkhāni;
analyzed: yesam pañca piyāni pañca tesam dukkhāni

original: yesaṁ cattāri piyāni, cattāri tesaṁ dukkhāni;
analyzed: yesam cattāri piyāni cattāri tesam dukkhāni

original: yesaṁ tīṇi piyāni, tīṇi tesaṁ dukkhāni;
analyzed: yesam tīṇi piyāni tīṇi tesam dukkhāni

original: yesaṁ dve piyāni, dve tesaṁ dukkhāni;
analyzed: yesam dve piyāni dve tesam dukkhāni

original: yesaṁ ekaṁ piyaṁ, ekaṁ tesaṁ dukkhaṁ;
analyzed: yesam ekam piyaḥ ekam tesam

original: yesaṁ natthi piyaṁ, natthi tesaṁ dukkhaṁ, asokā te virajā anupāyāsāti vadāmī”ti.
analyzed: yesam natthi piya natthi tesam dukkha asokā te virajā anupāyāsā ati vadāmi iti

original: Atha kho bhagavā etamatthaṁ viditvā tāyaṁ velāyaṁ imaṁ udānaṁ udānesi:
analyzed: atha kho bhagavā etam attham viditvā tāyam velāyam imam udānam udānesi

original: “Ye keci sokā paridevitā vā,
analyzed: ye keci sokā paridevitā vā

original: Dukkhā va lokasmimanekarūpā;
analyzed: dukkhā va lokasmim aneka rūpā

original: Piyaṁ paṭiccappabhavanti ete,
analyzed: piyam paṭiccappabhavanti ete

original: Piye asante na bhavanti ete.
analyzed: piye asante na bhavanti ete

original: Tasmā hi te sukhino vītasokā,
analyzed: tasmai hi te sukhinaḥ vīta sokā

original: Yesaṁ piyaṁ natthi kuhiñci loke;
analyzed: yesam piyam na atthi kuhiñci loke

original: Tasmā asokaṁ virajaṁ patthayāno,
analyzed: tasmai asokam virajam patthayānaḥ

original: Piyaṁ na kayirātha kuhiñci loke”ti.
analyzed: piyam na kayirātha kuhiñci loka iti

original: Aṭṭhamaṁ.
analyzed: aṭṭhama
